# Set package options

Example use of `.onAttach()` to set package options in the 
[rpushbullet package by Dirk Eddelbuettel](https://github.com/eddelbuettel/rpushbullet/blob/master/R/init.R).
Create an `.onAttach()` function, which sets options such as
` options("rpushbullet.key" = pb[["key"]])`.

[Set options in own package](https://stackoverflow.com/questions/30411691/auto-set-options-in-own-package)
```{r}
options(tradeflows = list(template = "template"))
getOption("tradeflows")
getOption("tradeflows")$template
```
